Sertifi | Mid - Senior Full Stack, Front End, UI/UX Designer | Chicago (onsite)

Apply at https://corp.sertifi.com/about-us/careers/opportunities/

Sertifi offers the fastest and most secure way to close business, from eSignatures to online payment capture.

We are a small company with 48 total employees, but that gives you the opportunity to take the lead of projects and make a big impact with our organization. We have a great product here, but we like to compete by being more innovative than our competitors, which is where you come in.

Full Stack: Looking for a talented and highly motivated .Net Developer to help launch new features and expand capabilities of our electronic signature and payment application ---Technologies: .Net, WebAPI, REST, SQL

Front End: Seeking an experienced application developer to lead front end development on our eSignature and payment platform. ---Technologies: Angular, jQuery, Bootstrap, Javascript
